issue.title: [C#] Add NuGet support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4839](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4839). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add the metadata to the .csproj so we can create a NuGet package without changing any source code.

Also, we should add any scripts and documentation on how to create the NuGet package to allow ease of creation at release time.
